channel.title: Error T2 and can't log onto servers
channel.description:
Sometimes while playing mopar, i log out and it says Error T2 and a bunch of stuff. Now im fine with just logging back on, but can we do anything about it?
Also with any server i try to log on, it takes like 2 minutes and then says that the server must be down. And then when i look on the server status, all 3 servers i tried are online and everything. I also change the port according to the server if that matters...
Help please...
I've tried loads of servers... someone help.

item.title: Error T2 and can't log onto servers
item.dc:creator: @Setherex Setherex
item.description:
@Setherex wrote:

Alright i might try to fix up my firewall… I used to have hamachi, but noone told me how to use it, so screw that… lol. The other 2 don’t really help… but the first two might help. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Error T2 and can't log onto servers

item.title: Error T2 and can't log onto servers
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Sometimes they are on hamachi,witch you may not have.
Sometimes your fire-wall is blocking them.
It may be your computer.
It may be an error in your system.

Read full topic
